     </h1>

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:758px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17118704">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17118704">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17118704">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting Started with Selected Reference Materials and Websites
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17118704">
          <p>
           <strong>
            The Atlas of Food: Who Eats What, Where, and Why
           </strong>
           <br />
           Print Location: Trexler Library Reference Collection 641.3 M657a (Level A)
          </p>
          <p>
           <strong>
            Credo Reference
           </strong>
           <br />
           Credo Reference provides access to hundreds of reference works, including general and subject specific dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across major subject areas--all online, all searchable from one search box.
           <br />
           Location:
           <a href="http://0-www.credoreference.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/">
            Online
           </a>
           or search the library catalog by title to access
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <strong>
            Cambridge World History of Food
           </strong>
           <br />
           Online Location:
           <a href="http://search.credoreference.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/content/title/cupfood">
            Online
           </a>
           or search the library catalog by title to access
           <br />
           Print Location: Trexler Library Reference Collection 641.309 C178w (Level A)
          </p>
          <p>
           <strong>
            Encyclopedia of Food and Culture
           </strong>
           <br />
           Online Location:
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;res_id=info%3Asid%2Fgale%3AGVRL&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi%2Ffmt:kev:mtx:journal&amp;rft.isbn=9780684314167&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:oclc.org:mul_coll">
            Online
           </a>
           or search the library catalog by title to access
           <br />
           Print Location: Trexler Library Reference Collection 641.03 K19e (Level A)
          </p>
          <p>
           <strong>
            Encyclopedia of Food Sciences and Nutrition
           </strong>
           <br />
           Print Location: Trexler Library Reference Collection 613.203 E56o v.1-10 (Level A)
          </p>
          <p>
           <strong>
            The Oxford Companion to Food
           </strong>
           <br />
           Print Location: Trexler Library Reference Collection 641.3003 D252o (Level A)
          </p>
          <p>
           <strong>
            Oxford Encyclopedia of Food and Drink in America
           </strong>
           <br />
           Online Location:
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.oxfordreference.com/view/10.1093/acref/9780195154375.001.0001/acref-9780195154375">
            Online
           </a>
           or search the library catalog by title to access
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17118704" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17118705">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17118705">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17118705">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17118705">
          <p>
           <strong>
            Popular Articles: Interdisciplinary Database
           </strong>
           s
          </p>
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=aph">
             Academic Search Complete
            </a>
            <br />
            A database of both scholarly and popular publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas, including sociology. Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the
            <strong>
             Check for Full Text
            </strong>
            <span>
             &nbsp;buttons&nbsp;
            </span>
            to check for full text online or in the library.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic">
             LexisNexis Academic
            </a>
            <br />
            A database of popular newspapers, magazines, and broadcast transcripts, as well as business publications, legal materials, and more. Full text is linked directly in the database.
           </p>
          </blockquote>
          <p>
           <b>
            Scholarly Articles: Subject Specific Databases
           </b>
          </p>
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            <a href="http://agricola.nal.usda.gov/">
             AGRICOLA
            </a>
            <br />
            A database of citations to scientific literature primarily focusing on agriculture (including books, articles, and online resources) created by the National Agriculture Library.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=31h">
             America: History and Life
            </a>
            <br />
            A database of scholarly journal articles, books, book chapter, book reviews, dissertations, and more in U.S. and Canadian history. Some full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the
            <strong>
             Check for Full Text
            </strong>
            <span>
             &nbsp;buttons
            </span>
            &nbsp;to check for full text online or in the library.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=bsh">
             Business Source Complete
            </a>
            <br />
            Database of scholarly and trade journals covering all aspects of accounting, business, and economics.&nbsp; Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the
            <strong>
             Check for Full Text
            </strong>
            <span>
             &nbsp;buttons
            </span>
            &nbsp;to check for full text online or in the library.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=hia">
             Historical Abstracts with Full Text with Full Text
            </a>
            <br />
            A database of scholarly journal articles, books, book chapter, book reviews, dissertations, and more for world history (excluding U.S. and Canada). Some full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the
            <strong>
             Check for Full Text
            </strong>
            <span>
             &nbsp;buttons
            </span>
            &nbsp;to check for full text online or in the library.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/">
             JSTOR
            </a>
            <br />
            A database of scholarly journals for most academic disciplines, with many sociology journals. The most recent three to five years of most journals are not included. Full text is linked directly in the database.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/pais/ip?accountid=40980" target="_blank">
             PAIS
            </a>
            <br />
            Citations from scholarly journal articles, books, book chapters, policy briefs, government publications, and more from on domestic and international political, economic, social and public policy issues. Use the
            <strong>
             Check for Full Text
            </strong>
            <span>
             &nbsp;buttons
            </span>
            &nbsp;to check for full text online or in the library.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://online.sagepub.com/cgi/search">
             Sage Journals Online
            </a>
            <br />
            A database of scholarly journals published by Sage, providing wide coverage in all disciplines, but particularly the social sciences. Full text for articles published 1999 to the present is linked directly in the database; otherwise, search the library catalog by journal titles to check for full text online or in the library.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/socabs/advanced?accountid=40980">
             Sociological Abstracts
            </a>
            <br />
            Citations to scholarly journal articles, books, book chapters, dissertations and more in sociology and related disciplines in the social and behavioral sciences. Use the
            <strong>
             Check for Full Text
            </strong>
            <span>
             &nbsp;buttons
            </span>
            &nbsp;to check for full text online or in the library.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/wpsashell/ip?accountid=40980" target="_blank">
             Worldwide Political Science Abstracts
            </a>
            <br />
            Citations from scholarly journal articles, books, book chapters, policy briefs, government publications, and more in political science and complementary fields, including international relations, law, and public administration/policy. Use the
            <strong>
             Check for Full Text
            </strong>
            <span>
             &nbsp;buttons
            </span>
            &nbsp;to check for full text online or in the library.
           </p>
          </blockquote>
          <p>
           <b>
            Scholarly Articles: Interdisciplinary Databases
           </b>
          </p>
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            <a href="http://0-search.ebscohost.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=aph">
            </a>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=aph">
             Academic Search Complete
            </a>
            <br />
            A database of both scholarly and popular publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas, including sociology. Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the
            <strong>
             Check for Full Text
            </strong>
            <span>
             &nbsp;buttons
            </span>
            &nbsp;to check for full text online or in the library.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://scholar.google.com/">
             Google Scholar
            </a>
            <br />
            Search scholarly literature via Google. Some full text is linked directly; otherwise, search the library catalog by journal titles to check for full text online or in the library.
           </p>
          </blockquote>
          <div id="boxatt17118705" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox18458386">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18458386">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18458386">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting the Full Text of Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content10536644">
          <p>
           To get the full text of an article, consider the following options:
          </p>
          <p>
           - If you are in Encompass Search or a library database, look for "Check for Full Text buttons," "Access Online," or "Check eResources" buttons. These buttons will take you the full text of the article or tell you that the full text cannot be found. If the full text is not available from Trexler Library, look for buttons to request the item from another library via interlibrary loan. Or go directly to the
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           request forms.
          </p>
          <p>
           - If you have citation information for the article (i.e., journal title, article title, publication year, etc.), type the information about your article in
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/">
            Encompass Search
           </a>
           on the library website. If the library subscribes to the full text, you will be directed to the article (see first bullet above). If not, you can request a copy of the article via
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           - If Trexler Library does not have access to the full text of the article, search
           <a href="http://www.google.com/scholar">
            Google Scholar
           </a>
           by article title to see if the author has made a copy freely available online. If not, you can request a copy of the article via
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10536644" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20287390">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20287390">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20287390">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding Books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20287390">
          <p>
           <strong>
            SEARCHING FOR BOOKS WITH ENCOMPASS SEARCH
           </strong>
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/discovery">
            Encompass Search
           </a>
           finds information by searching through a massive collection of books, scholarly journals, newspapers and magazines, dissertations, conference proceedings, music, video, maps, and more. Rather than searching in separate databases, Encompass Search helps you find resources from many catalogs and databases quickly and easily, all from a single search box.&nbsp;
          </p>
          <p>
           To find only books, use the Books limit on the left sidebar of your search results page. Many items will be in Trexler Library; note the call number and status of the item to check its location and availability. For items not in Trexler Library, use the Interlibrary Loan to request a copy from another library.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt20287390" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20287401">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20287401">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20287401">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding More Information on the Web
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content20287401">
          <p>
           <strong>
            Data and Statistics / Government Organizations
           </strong>
           <em>
            <br />
           </em>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            Please note that this is a selected list.&nbsp; Explore further with your own web searching.&nbsp; For recommendations regarding general domestic and international statistical websites/resources, see the
            <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=357827&amp;sid=2997258">
             Finding Data and Statistics
            </a>
            tab of the Sociology subject guide.&nbsp;
           </em>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <a href="http://faostat3.fao.org/home/E">
            Food and Agriculture Organization
           </a>
           (United Nations)
           <br />
           Agricultural, food, and food safety statistics by region, country, and world.
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <a href="http://www.nass.usda.gov/" target="_blank">
            National Agricultural Statistics Service
           </a>
           <br />
           Statistics on "virtually every aspect of U.S. agriculture, [including]: production and supplies of food and fiber, prices paid and received by farmers, farm labor and wages, farm finances, chemical use, changes in the demographics of U.S. producers," and more.
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <a href="http://comtrade.un.org/">
            Comtrade
           </a>
           (United Nations)
           <br />
           UN Comtrade is a repository of official trade statistics and relevant analytical tables. It contains annual trade statistics starting from 1962 and monthly trade statistics since 2010.
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <a href="http://www.usda.gov/wps/portal/usda/usdahome">
            United States Department of Agriculture
           </a>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 60px;">
           <a href="http://www.usda.gov/wps/portal/usda/usdahome?navid=DATA_STATISTICS">
            Data and Statistics
           </a>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <a href="http://www.fda.gov/Food/default.htm">
            United States Food and Drug Administration: Food
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
           <strong>
            &nbsp;Trade Associations
           </strong>
           <em>
            <br />
           </em>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            Please note that this is a selected list.&nbsp; Explore further with your own web searching.
           </em>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <a href="http://www.foodinfonet.com/Associations/Association2.htm">
            Directory for Food Industry Associations
           </a>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <a href="http://www.careersinfood.com/food-and-beverage-trade-associations-resource-14.htm">
            Directory of Food and Beverage Trade Associations
           </a>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <a href="http://www.pma.com/">
            Produce Marketing Association
           </a>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <a href="http://www.foodinfonet.com/Associations/Association2.htm">
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt20287401" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox18458453">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18458453">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18458453">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Your Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17118559">
          <ul>
           <li>
            For information on
            <strong>
             why to cite your sources
            </strong>
            and
            <strong>
             how to avoid plagiarism
            </strong>
            , see the
            <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=471100&amp;sid=3856388">
             Get Started with Library Research: Cite Sources
            </a>
            guide.&nbsp;
           </li>
          </ul>
          <ul>
           <li>
            For help using
            <strong>
             American Sociological Association Style
            </strong>
            , consult the following resources:
           </li>
          </ul>
          <blockquote>
           <ul>
            <li>
             ASA Style Guide (4th ed., 2010)
             <br />
             Location: Ready Reference 808.0663 A512a 2010
            </li>
           </ul>
          </blockquote>
          <blockquote>
           <ul>
            <li>
             Formatting in Sociology: ASA Style (Purdue)
             <br />
             <a href="https://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/583/03/">
              https://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/583/03/
             </a>
             <br />
             <em>
              Note: See left sidebar for in-text citation information, as well.
              <br />
             </em>
            </li>
           </ul>
          </blockquote>
          <blockquote>
           <ul>
            <li>
             Quick Style Guide (American Sociological Association)
             <br />
             <a href="http://www.asanet.org/documents/teaching/pdfs/Quick_Tips_for_ASA_Style.pdf">
              http://www.asanet.org/documents/teaching/pdfs/Quick_Tips_for_ASA_Style.pdf
             </a>
            </li>
           </ul>
          </blockquote>
          <ul>
           <li>
            <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
             Zotero
             <br />
            </a>
            "Free, easy-to-use tool to help you collect, organize, cite, and share your research sources." Download instructions and help available on the site.
           </li>
          </ul>
          <div id="boxatt17118559" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4652635" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox18458357">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18458357">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18458357">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need Help with Your Research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17117745">
          <p>
           <em>
            Contact:
           </em>
          </p>
          <p>
           <b>
            Jen Jarson
           </b>
           <br />
           Social Sciences Reference Librarian
           <br />
           phone: 484-664-3552
           <br />
           email: jarson@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17117745" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
